title: LF high elo mid laner. Capable of playing OOL and other serious events.
body: Contact me on league client if interested in a highly competitive welcoming team environment. The guys here will never let you down and ensure you always have a good time.

replies.body:
Hi guys, would love to join your team!
My peak rank is Platinum 1, and I play all roles comfortably except ADC.
I use Discord and Skype primarily! And I am also a capable shotcaller if needed

Mid champs: Pretty much anyone
Jungle: Most tank junglers (Heca, Zac etc), Graves, Lee Sin
Top: Sion, Camille, Jayce, Kennen, most tank tops
Support: Thresh, Leo, Naut, Zyra, Brand, Karma, Blitz, Morg etc etc

Heres my OPGG: https://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=Blizzard9789
